basics.label: Lead Pharmacy Technician Advocate - Supervisor
basics.summary: Lead Pharmacy Technician with strong supervisory, customer service, and healthcare skills. Proven ability to manage a busy pharmacy and ensure its smooth running.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Assist pharmacist in the provision of pharmaceutical care by reviewing, collecting, and entering data used by pharmacists. Directly supervise the pharmacy technicians to keep a constant flow. Accountable for managing the day to day activities of the technician staff.
highlights: Assist Business Pharmacy Manager with daily drug orders for all accounts
Answer multi line phones, register patients and deliver superb customer service
Assist patients in applying to Medication Assistance Program and maintain patient status

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Ensured that the restaurant operated efficiently and profitably while maintaining its reputation and ethos.
highlights: Coordinated a variety of activities while handling the business performance
Strategic planning and day-to-day management activities
Developed weekly and monthly food planning and coordinating menus

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Promptly schedule or check in and check out patients for appointments or make specialty and referral appointments.
highlights: Maintained all medical records up to date and sent to other medical facilities upon request
Collected, handled, and processed medical insurance, accept co-pays and payments for clinic visits
Set up new charts and prepare for the next day
